metaDescription: Looking to hire a freelance full stack developer? Asad Khan specializes in Angular, React, Node.js, and .NET solutions. Available for remote projects globally.
name: Asad Mateen Khan
homepageH1: Hire a Freelance Full Stack Developer Specializing in Angular, React, and .NET
tagline: Building Scalable Web Applications with Angular, React, and .NET
specialty: Experienced freelance full stack developer delivering modern, responsive web solutions using Angular, React, Node.js, and .NET technologies. Available for remote projects globally.
skillsIntro: With over 12 years of experience as a freelance full stack developer, I have mastered a wide range of modern technologies including Angular, React, Node.js, and .NET. Here are the tools and frameworks I work with daily to build scalable, high-performance web applications.
experienceIntro: I have contributed to global enterprises and startups alike, building enterprise-grade software solutions across Germany, the UAE, and Pakistan. My professional experience spans frontend, backend, DevOps, and automation.
educationIntro: A strong academic foundation in computer science has equipped me with the analytical thinking and technical skills necessary to excel in full stack development and complex system integrations.
certificationsIntro: Continuous learning is key in the evolving tech world. Here are the certifications I've earned to stay at the forefront of software development, DevOps, and modern web technologies.
contactIntro: Ready to bring your ideas to life? I'm available for freelance full stack development projects globally, specializing in Angular, React, Node.js, and scalable web solutions. Let's discuss your project!
